message_1: Using the Rail fence cipher with key 3, encrypt the plaintext "HELLO WORLD".
message_2:
To encrypt the plaintext "HELLO WORLD" using the Rail Fence cipher with a key of 3, we arrange the letters in a zigzag pattern with 3 rows:

H . . . O . . . R . . .
. E . L . W . L . D .
. . L . . . O . . . .

Now, we read the letters row by row to get the encrypted text:

HORELWLDLO
